title: Getting the job: personal experiences with selection panels
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Ministry of Education. Film, Television and Audio Unit, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Applications for positions
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Women in education
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women - Employment
description: Focuses on the strategies women employ in order to maximise their chances in job applications. 1. Getting the job. Details the strategies that can be used in job applications as well as techniques to help ensure a successful interview. Women who have been successful in obtaining positions talk about their experiences in applying for jobs. 2 Personal Experiences with Selection Panels. Several women who have been successful in obtaining positions within the Ministry of Education give advice on their experiences in applying for jobs.
